typeSystemDescription.name: NLP_Medics_Type_System
typeSystemDescription.description: A type system corresponding to the updated medics schema in the HSIS CCTS Oracle sytem at UAB. Represents the NLP_Clobs, NLP_Hits and I2B2_2010_Concept_Assertion Table. Now includes support for the NLP_ENTITY* tables

typeDescription.name: edu.uab.ccts.nlp.uima.ts.NLP_Clobs
typeDescription.description: Describes UAB's HSIS NLP_DOCS table with the exception of the document text.

featureDescription.name: ReportID
featureDescription.description: Should be changed to number, will represent medics unique identifier.

featureDescription.name: DateOfService
featureDescription.description: No date features appears to be present in UIMA, using String. Should be stored in ISO/Oracle date format of YYYY-MM-dd

featureDescription.name: Source
featureDescription.description: Source of the document type, actual ontology/dictionary used to construct is unknown. Careflow, ICDA are main systems.

featureDescription.name: DocumentTypeAbbreviation
featureDescription.description: Corresponds to the "type" column in NLP_CLOBS table.

featureDescription.name: DocumentSubType
featureDescription.description: Corresponds to NLP_CLOBS NC_Subtype

featureDescription.name: DocumentVersion
featureDescription.description: The version of the document, typically 1, 2 or 3 from Careflow.

featureDescription.name: HasBeenProcessed
featureDescription.description: Whether the document has been processed by any pipeline, just cancer registry for now.

featureDescription.name: MedicsArrivalTime
featureDescription.description: Date at which document arrived in NLP_Clobs

featureDescription.name: SourceID
featureDescription.description: Identifier in the source

featureDescription.name: JavaHashCode
featureDescription.description: Java 32 bit hash code String.hashCode() of documenmt.

featureDescription.name: ImportAnalysis
featureDescription.description: The analysis responsible (if any) for inserting this document into Medics.

typeDescription.name: edu.uab.ccts.nlp.uima.ts.NLP_Hits_Extended
typeDescription.description: Corresponds to the NLP_HITS_EXTENDED table. This is really a wrapper for a bunch of other concepts thrown into a convienence patient centric representation.

featureDescription.name: HitID
featureDescription.description: Primary key of table

featureDescription.name: HitText
featureDescription.description: Text that was used to derive the concept as best determined by that algorithm.

featureDescription.name: AnalysisID
featureDescription.description: Identifier to the primary key of the analysis that was done, foudn in the NLP_ANALYSIS table.

featureDescription.name: DocumentID
featureDescription.description: The document identifier from whence the hit was derived.

featureDescription.name: ConceptText
featureDescription.description: Text of the concept in the Ontology, typically a concept name in UMLS. Not neccessarily the "best" named as determined by MRRANK or MetaMap

featureDescription.name: PreferredName
featureDescription.description: UMLS preferred name for the concept

featureDescription.name: HitTextExtended
featureDescription.description: The text around the hit, including flanking regions that are outside the text that was used to determine the concept to provide context.

featureDescription.name: SNOMEDID
featureDescription.description: SNOMED ID of hit

featureDescription.name: ExternalHitID
featureDescription.description: Reference to another system that may have generated this hit if any, for example YTEX.

featureDescription.name: SegmentName
featureDescription.description: Name of the PTL Segment, DRUGS, PROBLEMS, etc..

featureDescription.name: UMLSSemanticTypes
featureDescription.description: List of semantic types from UMLS, have not decided on Txxx format or the short abbreviation yet (neop)

featureDescription.name: Score
featureDescription.description: Score produced by software, typically MetaMap

featureDescription.name: MRN
featureDescription.description: Medical Record Number (often null)

featureDescription.name: isPossible
featureDescription.description: Indicates uncertainity, corresponding to the ShareClef 2015 values. yes means there is doubt/uncertainity.

featureDescription.name: SubjectClass
featureDescription.description: Originally refered to the patient or to a family member. Now it is ia mini-vocabulary based on ShareClef 2015 that can have values patient, family_member, donor_family_member, donor_other, null, other

featureDescription.name: CourseClass
featureDescription.description:
Corresponds to ShareClef 2015, unmarked, changed, increased, decreased, improved, worsened and resolved.
Was Line starting (index from 1, not 0) that annotation occured at in the document.

featureDescription.name: SeverityClass
featureDescription.description:
unmarked (default), slight, moderate, severe
Was Line (index from 1, not 0) that the annotation ended at in the document.

featureDescription.name: IsConditional
featureDescription.description: 0 indicates hit is not conditional, 1 indicates it does. May later replace with cvterm_id to something more nuanced.

featureDescription.name: IsGeneric
featureDescription.description: A 1 indicates this a generic mention (not specific to subject/patient) whereas the default 0 indicates it refers to the subject.

featureDescription.name: MappingScore
featureDescription.description: How well the hit maps in conjunction with others in the same phrase to its target.

featureDescription.name: LineStartIndex
featureDescription.description: Old line start index

featureDescription.name: Regex
featureDescription.description: The regular expression used to locate the start of this segment.

featureDescription.name: Text
featureDescription.description: Text from document corresponding to annotation

featureDescription.name: LineStart
featureDescription.description: On what line the annotation starts

featureDescription.name: WordStart
featureDescription.description: The word index when the annotation starts

featureDescription.name: LineStop
featureDescription.description: Line on which the annotation stops.

featureDescription.name: WordStop
featureDescription.description: Index of the word on which the annotation stops

featureDescription.name: NERType
featureDescription.description: Named Entity Recognition Type (problem, treatment, or test)

featureDescription.name: I2B2DocumentID
featureDescription.description: Identifying document id - filename without extension

featureDescription.name: Source
featureDescription.description: Source of i2b2 Documents. beth, partners or test

typeDescription.name: edu.uab.ccts.nlp.uima.ts.NLP_Analysis
typeDescription.description: The result of an analysis run.

featureDescription.name: AnalysisType
featureDescription.description: Type of the analysis

featureDescription.name: AnalysisID
featureDescription.description: Primary key in database that analysis result was inserted into

featureDescription.name: AnalysisSoftware
featureDescription.description: Name of the pipeline or aggregate analysis used.

featureDescription.name: AnalysisSoftwareVersion
featureDescription.description: Version of the pipeline, typically subversion commit #

featureDescription.name: Machine
featureDescription.description: Hostname that the pipeline ran on, for example, ASH, etc..

featureDescription.name: AnalysisConceptFilter
featureDescription.description: Description of any concept filtering, can include UMLS semantic types, stop concepts, etc..

featureDescription.name: AnalysisDate
featureDescription.description: Date analysis was started, use Oracle date format.

featureDescription.name: AnalysisDataSet
featureDescription.description: Should be integer now. This is the documentSetIdentifier in medics

featureDescription.name: DocumentSource
featureDescription.description: Long form text description of the selection criteria for these documents. This is the name of the document set.

featureDescription.name: UMLSRelease
featureDescription.description: UMLS Release, ex) 2012AB

featureDescription.name: MedicsURL
featureDescription.description: MedicsURL, using it as a parameter holder

featureDescription.name: AnnotatorID
featureDescription.description: ID for annotator

featureDescription.name: AnnotatorAnalysisSeed
featureDescription.description: Analysis used to pre-populate the document set for the annotator to make their life easier.

featureDescription.name: MetaMapPort
featureDescription.description: The MetaMap port to use, more than one may be available.

featureDescription.name: UMLSConnectionString
featureDescription.description: Connection string to connect to a locate Oracle instance of UMLS

featureDescription.name: AnalysisDescription
featureDescription.description: A description of the analysis provided by the client, otherwise a default description is used.

typeDescription.name: edu.uab.ccts.nlp.uima.ts.Document_Results
typeDescription.description: Contains document level results, including the serailized CAS as a string, number of annotations, etc...

featureDescription.name: DocumentID
featureDescription.description: ID of document that the result came from.

featureDescription.name: AnalysisID
featureDescription.description: Foreign key to analysis table

featureDescription.name: XMI_ResultString
featureDescription.description: CAS outputed as XMI

featureDescription.name: StatusID
featureDescription.description: The status of the processing, corresponds to an entry in the NLP_DOC_STATUS table. 3 is success, all other are incompletes or error codes.

typeDescription.name: edu.uab.ccts.nlp.uima.ts.SemEvalMapping
typeDescription.description: SemEval discontinous mapping to UMLS CUI

featureDescription.name: SemEvalSemantictype
featureDescription.description: The semantic type being analyzed.

featureDescription.name: SemEvalCUI
featureDescription.description: UMlS CUI mapped to

featureDescription.name: SemEvalSpans
featureDescription.description: SemEval spans for the mapped text, may be discontinous. 0 is the start, 1 is the end, 2 is the start of the 2nd piece of text, 3 is the end of the 2nd element

featureDescription.name: NegationIndicator
featureDescription.description: True if negated, output yes

featureDescription.name: SubjectClass
featureDescription.description: patient (default), family_member, donor_family_member, donor_other,null,other

featureDescription.name: UncertainityIndicator
featureDescription.description: True (yes) if uncertain

featureDescription.name: CourseClass
featureDescription.description: unmarked (default), changed, increased, decreased, improved, worsened, resolved

featureDescription.name: SeverityClass
featureDescription.description: unmarked (default), slight, moderate, severe

featureDescription.name: ConditionalClass
featureDescription.description: True (yes) if disease conditionally exists (example, ruling out?)

featureDescription.name: GenericClass
featureDescription.description: true if a generic mention of a disease, false default

featureDescription.name: BodyLocation
featureDescription.description: NULL (default), CUI,CUI-less

featureDescription.name: DocTimeClass
featureDescription.description: TimeML Expression

featureDescription.name: TemporalExpression
featureDescription.description: TimeML Expression

featureDescription.name: FileName
featureDescription.description: Name of file for ShareClef output

featureDescription.name: DiseaseCUIs
featureDescription.description: List of CUIs associated with disease

featureDescription.name: DiseaseOffsets
featureDescription.description: Strings of "start-end" mapping to DiseaseCUIs

typeDescription.name: edu.uab.ccts.nlp.uima.ts.ShareClef2014_attribute
typeDescription.description: ShareClef attribute, ex) negation, body location, etc...

featureDescription.name: ShareClefValue
featureDescription.description: Value

typeDescription.name: edu.uab.ccts.nlp.uima.ts.Span
typeDescription.description: Span of text in as document, stored in a database.

featureDescription.name: spanID
featureDescription.description: span_id in database

featureDescription.name: documentID
featureDescription.description: docID from NLP_Docs

typeDescription.name: edu.uab.ccts.nlp.uima.ts.Entity
typeDescription.description: An entity detected by an NER tool. Stored in database.

featureDescription.name: entityID
featureDescription.description: id in database

featureDescription.name: analysisID
featureDescription.description: Analysis in database

featureDescription.name: humanAnnotationID
featureDescription.description: ID of NLP_Annotation

featureDescription.name: entityTypeID
featureDescription.description: cvterm_id for entity type

featureDescription.name: score
featureDescription.description: raw score from analysis that found entity

featureDescription.name: conceptGroupID
featureDescription.description: Default 0, other CUIs with the same group number and jointly describing an entity
